content:
The Lime-Honey Syrup is a classic combination that's sure to please. The freshness of the lime juice and the sweetness of the honey will complement the tropical flavors of the mango, pineapple, and kiwi perfectly. And since your mom loves lime, I'm sure she'll appreciate the extra touch.

It was my pleasure to help you plan a delicious and thoughtful Mother's Day dinner for your mom. I hope everything turns out wonderfully, and that your mom feels loved and appreciated on her special day.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and your mom a wonderful Mother's Day celebration!
